FabricationDone.Description:: A fabrication process of a fabrication module finishes and can be collected, only triggered if the player is not in the menu

ShipyardDone.Description:: A shipyard is done with a construction and can be collected, only triggered if the player is not in the menu

RefineDone.Description:: A refining process is done and can be collected, only triggered if the player is not in the menu

MiningDone.Description:: A process by a generation module has finished and the resources can be collected

ResearchDone.Description:: A research process is done and can be collected, only triggered if the player is not in the menu

DockRepairDone.Description:: The fleet has been fully repaired at the dock, only triggered if the player has not used instant repair

SickbayDone.Description:: The sickbay has healed the last officer in the queue and is now idle, only triggered if the player is not in the menu

MultipleDone.EventTrigger:: Multiple (3+) of the above processes have finished
MultipleDone.Description:: Multiple (3+) of the above processes (category: Process) have finished, since the player has been in the game

RPCapReached.EventTrigger:: Research Point cap has been reached
RPCapReached.Description:: Research Point cap of a research module has been reached

Maintenance.EventTrigger:: Gets pushed when we announce maintenance
Maintenance.Description:: Is manually activated when we want to announce an upcoming maintenance

InitCallUsersBack-D1.EventTrigger:: The next day from the player last logged in day
InitCallUsersBack-D1.Description:: InitCallUsersBack-Dxx is set when the player gets the push notification id. This notification is not changed

InitCallUsersBack-D3.EventTrigger:: 3 days later from the player last logged in day

InitCallUsersBack-D7.EventTrigger:: 7 days later from the player last logged in day

InitCallUsersBack-D14.EventTrigger:: 14 days later from the player last logged in day

InitCallUsersBack-D30.EventTrigger:: 30 days later from the player last logged in day

CallUsersBack-D1.EventTrigger:: The next day from the player last logged in day
CallUsersBack-D1.Description:: CallUsersBack-Dxx is set based on the player's last logout

CallUsersBack-D3.EventTrigger:: 3 days later from the player last logged in day

CallUsersBack-D7.EventTrigger:: 7 days later from the player last logged in day

CallUsersBack-D14.EventTrigger:: 14 days later from the player last logged in day

CallUsersBack-D30.EventTrigger:: 30 days later from the player last logged in day

EventQuestActive_0.Description:: An event quest became active and the player can progress it now

PremiumEndsSoon.EventTrigger:: The premium subscription ends in X days

IdleMiningCapReached.EventTrigger:: Idle mining cap has been reached
IdleMiningCapReached.Description:: The idle mining cap of one of the player's idle mining fleets/stations has been reached

FreebieAvailable.EventTrigger:: A free item is available on the market
FreebieAvailable.Description:: The timer for the free item in the market has run out/reset and the player can collect a new one
